channel.title: How Can I Get Pwned By A Ranger?
channel.description: Im a lvl 44 with full addy armor and addy skimmy. and i fought this lvl 42 ranger using addy arrows. How was he pulling of 10-12 dmg with his bows. My armor specs said i had over 140+ defence to range? how was he owning me, oh by the way i ran when he hit an 11. :)

item.title: How Can I Get Pwned By A Ranger?
item.dc:creator: @NickMoran06 NickMoran06
item.description:
@NickMoran06 wrote:

Are you sure it wasn’t Attack Bonus?

Read full topic
item.source: How Can I Get Pwned By A Ranger?

item.title: How Can I Get Pwned By A Ranger?
item.dc:creator: @Erj Erj
item.description:
@Erj wrote:

Nah man he just better than u i suppose :P. Anyways like the recent posts rangers tend to hide their ranging level from combat. I thought “Hey the triangle says i pwn rangers XD” But when I got into I fight I nearly died So yeah rangers are awsome owners.

Read full topic
item.source: How Can I Get Pwned By A Ranger?

item.title: How Can I Get Pwned By A Ranger?
item.dc:creator: @buckleyindahouse buckleyindahouse
item.description:
@buckleyindahouse wrote:

Well, i was trying to do a pure on my other accounts, everytime i go up 2 range lvls i go up an actual level. nothing else goes up except the range. Is that an update jagex made to keep us from raping noobs?

Read full topic
item.source: How Can I Get Pwned By A Ranger?

item.title: How Can I Get Pwned By A Ranger?
item.dc:creator: @slayer215 slayer215
item.description:
@slayer215 wrote:

buckleyindahouse:

Im a lvl 44 with full addy armor and addy skimmy. and i fought this lvl 42 ranger using addy arrows. How was he pulling of 10-12 dmg with his bows. My armor specs said i had over 140+ defence to range? how was he owning me, oh by the way i ran when he hit an 11.

His range lvl is twice as high as your strength lvl, and his range bonus is around 70. His max is twice as high as yours. Do the math.

Read full topic
item.source: How Can I Get Pwned By A Ranger?

item.title: How Can I Get Pwned By A Ranger?
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

buckleyindahouse:

Im a lvl 44 with full addy armor and addy skimmy. and i fought this lvl 42 ranger using addy arrows. How was he pulling of 10-12 dmg with his bows. My armor specs said i had over 140+ defence to range? how was he owning me, oh by the way i ran when he hit an 11.

Don’t you know anything about pures? hell making a pure was the only fun thing in runescape, killing noobs and making them cry.

Read full topic
item.source: How Can I Get Pwned By A Ranger?
